title: I got fed, won bot lane, and my Ryze got mad and sat in fountain...
body:
Because I rotated to top (his lane) and pushed to take the tower since mid had the other 3 teammates pushing.
He sat in fountain for a good 10-15 minutes as we continued winning, until they began pushing as 5 and using their Malph's ult on me to win fights. We won after Malph missed ults, I was building Banshee's in case he landed them, and because when Ryze FINALLY decided to come back, he didn't feed.

But seriously, who AFKs because your fed teammate is pushing the lane to take tower?
